ActivityMetadata.Name: ZM Add IM Directory Group Members
ActivityMetadata.Label: ZM Add IM Directory Group Members
ActivityMetadata.Description: Add members to an [IM directory group](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/203749815-IM-Management) under an account. **Scope:** `imgroup:write:admin`
